title: Nike Mashup
imageCaption: CREATIVE DIRECTION / CAMPAIGN / BRAND / ART DIRECTION / DESIGN
description: An artistic mash-up of nike shoes and athletes
richtext:
This campaign combines nike basketball shoes with geographic icons from the regions each player represents.
